short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Middle-click on a Youtube video to mark it as "Not interested"

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mark Youtube videos as "Not interested" with a single mouse click.

This extension allows to remove videos from ones feed quicker by automating the click on the "three dots" menu button and the click on the "Not interested" menu item, which can get annoying when you want to remove a lot of videos.

The extension is configurable so it triggers only on left, middle or right click, with or without modifiers (ctrl and alt).
